body_html: Make sure you are not sitting inside your anaconda directory. cd to somewhere else (like C), ensure that you activate your environment then try again. From your issue file it suggests that you weren't inside your tensorflow environment when entering your python console.
body_text: Make sure you are not sitting inside your anaconda directory. cd to somewhere else (like C), ensure that you activate your environment then try again. From your issue file it suggests that you weren't inside your tensorflow environment when entering your python console.
body: Make sure you are not sitting inside your anaconda directory. cd to somewhere else (like C), **ensure that you activate your environment** then try again. From your issue file it suggests that you weren't inside your tensorflow environment when entering your python console.
